cards.rules_text:
Draft this card face up.
Immediately after the draft, look at another player's card pool. You may reveal a Vehicle card from it and offer that player one card in your card pool in exchange. They may decline offer.
Queen's Revenge can't be blocked by creatures if their controller declined its offer.
Crew 2

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Artifact spells you cast this turn cost {1} less to cast.
[0]: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
[-X]: Target Vehicle with crew X becomes an artifact creature with vigilance until your next turn.
[-8]: Search your library for up to eight Vehicles, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Those cards become artifact creatures with haste until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Draft this card face up.
As you draft an Equipment card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn this card face down.
Whenever your team casts an artifact spell with a name they noted, create a 1/1 white Solider creature token.

Reveal this card as you draft it. Look at the next card drafted by a player of your choice and note its name.
You may cast this card as though it had flash if an opponent cast a card this turn with a name you've noted.

Draft this card face up.
As you draft an Equipment or Vehicle card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn this card face down.
Whenever your team casts an artifact spell with a name they've noted, that player creates a Treasure token.

Draft this card face up.
As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, turn this card face down, then pass the next booster pack without drafting a card from it. [i](You may look at that booster pack.)[/i]

As you draft a card, you may reveal it, note its name, then turn this card face down.

Draft this card face up.
As you draft a card you may reveal it, note its name, and turn this card face down.

Counter target noncreature spell.

Reveal this card as you draft it. Reveal a nonland card you drafted this round and note its colors.
When Evergrove Wanderer enters the battlefield, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. If that land produces a color you've noted, you gain 3 life.

Draft this card face up.
At the end of this round, look at each card another player has drafted this round. You may note an artifact card name from among them.
When Myra's Acquisitioner enters the battlefield, gain control of all artifacts with names you've noted until end of turn. Untap those artifacts. They gain haste this turn.

noting — artifacts
